content: @Chris Birkbeck Forgive me for the self-promotion, but are you aware of https://github.com/kckennylau/EllipticCurve/ ? From a cursory glance of the LMFDB blueprint, they seem to be orthogonal, but I wonder if you have some thoughts.
Yes, we are and I should say I think thats great. I'd like to talk more about what we can collaborate on with respect to elliptic curves.
I had seen your project mentioned on a recent maths post. I think there's likely to be overlap and we'd be happy to collaborate.
Our first aim with respect to elliptic curves is defining their LMFDB labels. So we want their conductors for example.
